page.title: 02A.F. CONTD.
page.content: 69 acres _ oil seed rape. Whilst 32 acres of land are unused, the rest is for livestock as follows: 28 _ Beef cattle 8 _ Horses 9 _ Rams 410 _{Ewes.} The Ewes have approximately 800 lambs per year. 400 lambs and 50 ewes are sent to the slaughter house annually. Sheep are disinfected in a footbath or dip. Domestic{pets}are also used in farm work, i.e. for rounding up sheep and keeping away pests etc. The farm has an adequate amount of {machinery}for its size. There are 6 _ Tractors 1 _ Digger Loader 1 _ Combine Harvester Several new ploughs costing about
